meta.title: Octopi Poker - Master Your Poker Skills
meta.description: Join Octopi Poker's vibrant community to enhance your poker skills with comprehensive courses, expert coaching, and interactive forums.
meta.keywords: poker, poker training, poker community, poker courses, poker coaching

hero_section.header: Poker study for everyone, beginners to elite

testimonials.name: Brian Rast
testimonials.description: Looks like a perfect tool to study. Makes it fun while giving good information.

testimonials.name: Phil Laak
testimonials.description: It's an incredible poker learning tool. And fun as well!

testimonials.name: Joshua Arieh
testimonials.description: First time I've enjoyed studying. This is 10x more fun than 'practicing' online!

testimonials.name: Lucky Eva
testimonials.description: Love, love, LOVE Octopi! Thanks to the entire team for creating it!

testimonials.name: Publius
testimonials.description: The use of the Trainer alone would have been a steal at twice the price!

testimonials.name: JackRag
testimonials.description: I've used other Trainers before, but Octopi makes the most sense to me - so intuitive!

testimonials.name: Ryan Laplante
testimonials.description: Octopi is the best value GTO study tool on the market and what I use to improve my game.

testimonials.name: Eric Baldwin
testimonials.description: Cutting-edge and a game-changer. Its vibrant community fosters growth where improvement is fun.

testimonials.name: Brian Hastings
testimonials.description: As a coach, I use Octopi Vault to review final tables with sims. It's an awesome resource; I strongly recommend!

testimonials.name: Sampo37
testimonials.description: Octopi Poker has helped me transform the way I study. I love instant feedback on how to play as optimally as possible.

testimonials.name: Aaron Paul Kramer
testimonials.description: Studying a GAME shouldn't ever be daunting or stressful. Octopi solves both those issues and makes studying the game itself fun!

testimonials.name: 1to11er
testimonials.description: It's not a coincidence that my best year of poker coincides with subscription to Octopi.

testimonials.name: Ubbster
testimonials.description: Absolutely brilliant poker study tool! And superb support team!

testimonials.name: Shundan
testimonials.description: I love drilling against the trainer, especially for ICM FT spots - it's fun and builds confidence in high-stakes spots where I lack experience.

testimonials.name: Diane Zimmerman
testimonials.description: Octopi Poker creates and reinforces the right feedback loops for poker decision-making, and it's fun!

store_section.body: Embrace your inner octopus and proudly wear the exclusive Octopi merch. Elegant and comfortable, it is made for grinders like you.

coaching_section.body: Direct access to best poker coaches for every game, skill level and price point.

body.paragraph_1: Relive the excitement of high-stakes poker from Triton, PokerGO, WSOP and more. Over 18K hands and 2k preflop and postflop ICM sims to explore in both live play and HH replayer format.
body.paragraph_2: Or, put your skills to the test with our immersive trainer experience and compare your plays to those of the real players along with the AI solutions.

ask_george_section.meta_data: example one turn interaction with George, Octopi's AI coach

body.paragraph_1: Hello, I’m George, AI assistant in the poker world. Ask me anything related to poker, and I’ll try to be helpful in your path to poker mastery!
body.paragraph_2: How do I calculate pot odds?
